import React, { useState } from "react"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { ProSidebar, Menu, MenuItem, SubMenu } from "react-pro-sidebar"; import "react-pro-sidebar/dist/css/styles.css"; function NavigationBar() { const [menuCollapse, setMenuCollapse] = useState(false); const sidebarCss = { display: "block", float: "left", height: "100vh", }; const menuIconClick = () => { //condition checking to change state from true to false and vice versa menuCollapse ? setMenuCollapse(false) : setMenuCollapse(true); }; return ( <>
{/* small and big change using menucollapse state */}

{menuCollapse ? "Logo" : "Big Logo"}

{/* changing menu collapse icon on click */} {menuCollapse ? : }
Dashboard Add Project Projects Add User Users Project Progress Progress Info
); } export default NavigationBar;
